programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: I'm Not In Love
programme.desc: After receiving a marriage ultimatum from a woman he's not sure he truly loves, Rob is up against the clock to realise he should stop looking for the fabled 'Miss Right' and learn to see what's right in front of him.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: A Summer In Antwerp
programme.desc: Fashion designer Cara and her grandmother are reuniting with her childhood friend Judith who was forced to flee from Nazi Germany. But when they arrive at Antwerp to see her, it is not Judith who answers the door, but a young man named Mathis.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Masha
programme.desc: Masha has grown up between the boxing ring and the streets of her provincial Russian town. Her closest friends, young gangsters who are loathed by the entire town, love and protect her. And suddenly the cruel truth about them is revealed to her.

programme.title: Latin For All
programme.desc: Delphine, a disillusioned Latin teacher, made a deal with her class of 5 lazy students: if they keep quiet, they’ll all receive A grades without having to learn anything. Unfortunately, this qualifies them for a Latin competition taking place in Naples.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Aydede (Road To The Moon)
programme.desc: An upset Bekir who had recently lost his grandfather is told by his mother that his beloved grandfather has gone to the moon. While the adults fight over the inheritance, Bekir only dreams of flying to the moon with a bicycle, just like in a movie he saw.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: After taking the blame for the honor killing of his sister and serving his sentence, Yusuf must return to his family and brother who committed the murder. Yusuf struggles to reconcile family and tradition with the guilt and regret he feels over her death.

programme.title: Heavenly Nomadic

programme.title: A Summer In Antwerp
programme.desc: Fashion designer Cara and her grandmother are reuniting with her childhood friend Judith who was forced to flee from Nazi Germany. But when they arrive at Antwerp to see her, it is not Judith who answers the door, but a young man named Mathis.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Masha
programme.desc: Masha has grown up between the boxing ring and the streets of her provincial Russian town. Her closest friends, young gangsters who are loathed by the entire town, love and protect her. And suddenly the cruel truth about them is revealed to her.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: After taking the blame for the honor killing of his sister and serving his sentence, Yusuf must return to his family and brother who committed the murder. Yusuf struggles to reconcile family and tradition with the guilt and regret he feels over her death.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Aydede (Road To The Moon)
programme.desc: An upset Bekir who had recently lost his grandfather is told by his mother that his beloved grandfather has gone to the moon. While the adults fight over the inheritance, Bekir only dreams of flying to the moon with a bicycle, just like in a movie he saw.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Heavenly Nomadic
programme.desc: A family of nomads dwelling high in the mountains of Kyrgyzstan doesn't need any of the conveniences of modern civilization in order to be happy. But progress is creeping into their lives regardless, destroying legends and traditions as it comes.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Last Star Witness - Escape to the Alps
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a man she wrongly thought was about to attack her, a traumatised Sarah Kohr is sent away on leave to forget the ordeal. But when she witnesses a man being shot at the airport, she has to help his son flee from the unknown killer.

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Aurora (II)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.
